planets.name: Mercury
planets.description: The sun-scorched innermost planet is an intriguing world of extremes.

planets.name: Earth
planets.description: Earth is the third planet from the sun and the fifth largest in the solar system.

planets.name: Jupiter
planets.description: Jupiter is the fifth planet from our sun and the largest planet in the solar system.

planets.name: Uranus
planets.description: Uranus The seventh planet from the sun with the third largest diameter in our solar system, Uranus is very cold and windy.

planets.name: Neptune
planets.description: Dark, cold and whipped by supersonic winds, Neptune is the last of the hydrogen and helium gas giants in our solar system.

planets.name: Venus
planets.description: Venus is the second planet from the sun and our closest planetary neighbor.

planets.name: Mars
planets.description: Mars may have once been a wet world like Earth. Where did the water go?

planets.name: Saturn
planets.description: Saturn The second largest planet in our solar system, adorned with thousands of beautiful ringlets, Saturn is unique among the planets.
